name: Embrys the Anomaly

skills.name: A1: [Skill Name Unknown]
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Applies Necrosis debuff. If target dies, applies Necrosis stack to all enemies. Necrosis deals 5% MAX HP per stack at start of turn.

skills.name: A2: [Skill Name Unknown]
skills.description: Grants extra turn. Sets up Fears. Crowd control and debuff setup.

skills.name: A3: The Unmaking
skills.description: Removes all buffs from enemies and replaces with debuffs (Necrosis). Guaranteed removal of Stoneskin unless weak hit. Only Protected Buffs/Lightning Cage can block.

skills.name: Passive: [Skill Name Unknown]
skills.description: Activates Necrosis stacks at start/end of turn. Necrosis cannot be removed except by revive. Each revive reduces stacks.

skills.name: A1: [Skill Name Unknown]
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Hits twice if target has Necrosis. Can Block Revive.

skills.name: A2: [Skill Name Unknown]
skills.description: Deals double damage if Embrys has more ACC than target, or ignores 50% DEF if less ACC. Both scale with ACC, but ignore DEF is preferred for damage.

skills.name: A3: [Skill Name Unknown]
skills.description: Permanent Ignore DEF +10% per use (up to 50%). Fully heals Embrys and restores destroyed HP against bosses or swaps HP with enemy. Highly effective in Arena and Sand Devil.

skills.name: Passive: [Skill Name Unknown]
skills.description: Reflects 50% of damage taken and surplus damage when killed. Cheats death (1HP) and applies Revive on Death. Reflect includes excessive damage.

stat_priorities: Base: ACC, SPD, HP%, DEF%, RES
Alt: C.RATE, C.DMG, HP%, ACC, SPD
masteries: Alt: Offense, HP, C.DMG, ACC, SPD

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: No major AI issues reported. Manual play preferred for skill order.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Necrosis stacking, HP swap, damage reflect
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Can cheese bosses and Arena with Necrosis stacking and reflect mechanics. HP swap and permanent Ignore DEF are unique cheese tools.

mechanics_advisory: Necrosis is unique and cannot be removed except by revive. Metamorph form is highly effective for boss and Arena cheese. Manual skill order is critical for optimal results.
